---
title: "first plane ride"
description: "a poem about my son's first plane ride"
author: "Ben Jaques-Leslie"
date: "06/22/2025"
categories:
  - limerick
---

today Timmy takes his first airplane ride

he looks out at the airfield, by my side

as we race down the runway

squealing and kicking, away

we go up in the air, his grin so wide
